Package com.storeorderapplication.exception

Class StoreOrderExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.storeorderapplication.exception.StoreOrderExceptionHandler
@RestControllerAdvice
public class StoreOrderExceptionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles all the exceptions thrown by the application and wraps them into ErrorResponse message for easy readability of the users
